segments.text: I notice the boy grabbing cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's on that unstable stool, full of daring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, ready to catch one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is flooding behind them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman hasn't turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mess on the floor is ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool could tip and spill everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's noticed the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is beautiful, so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids being kids, I suppose, with their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate she's drying gleams in the light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame the whole sneaky operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing water makes me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR
